name: Multiplayer Spiders
description:
Multiplayer Spiders

You and Your steam spider friends must stop the invading spiders from spinning their web of fear

The game includes a Multiplayer & Single Player system.

You can Invite Your Steam Friends with the ' + ' Icon on the Main Menu !

* NOTE : You should have a Stable & Fast Internet Connection for Best Results *


Features:

Shoot Webs
Attack Invading Spiders
Collect Plus Icons to add to Your Progress
Don't Disturb the Humans as You Crawl Around
Find Your Way in the Vast Environment
Master the Complex Controls of using ALL 8 legs to navigate
Use Your Webs to get to Challenging Places

How Many "Easter Eggs" can You find?
